question: 三個
sourceAnswer: Three Small Things, Three Things, Three Objects, Three Small Objects
activeAnswer: Three Small Things, Three Things, Three Objects, Three Small Objects
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Three</kanji> <kanji>individual</kanji>s is <vocabulary>three small things</vocabulary>. The kanji <ja>個</ja> can be used to count small objects, just like this! Try other numbers as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
